overview:
Shaun has over 20 years’ experience developing and implementing investment strategies for clients ranging from central banks to pension schemes to charities and private individuals.

He was Chief Investment officer at BDO Investment Management for six years, in charge of the investment process for £2 billion of assets. While at BDO, he designed and managed a range of award-winning funds across multi-asset portfolios, commodities and fixed income.

Prior to BDO, he was Senior Economist and Head of Research for Crown Agents Investment Management, part of the team managing global bond and equity portfolios for central banks and public sector pension schemes.

Shaun holds a degree in Mathematical Economics from the University of Birmingham and is a Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst.
